title: ActionScript Graphing Cookbook [Opsylum]
description:
Book Description

The Ã¢â‚¬Å“ActionScript Graphing CookbookÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ shows you how to add your own charts to any ActionScript program. The recipes give step-by-step instructions on how to process the input data, how to create various types of charts and how to make them interactive for even more user engagement.

First learn how to import your data, from Excel, web services and more. Next process the data and make it ready for graphical display.
